Module contents

class defi_sdk_py.helper_pool.BorrowingInterest(ltv: int, interest: int)[source]

Bases: object

Represents the borrowing interest details for a loan.

Parameters:

  • ltv – The loan-to-value ratio

  • interest – The interest amount

class defi_sdk_py.helper_pool.ClaimableInterest(tokenInterest: int, forwInterest: int)[source]

Bases: object

Represents the claimable interest for a stake in a pool.

Parameters:

  • tokenInterest – The claimable token interest amount

  • forwInterest – The claimable forward interest amount

class defi_sdk_py.helper_pool.HelperPool[source]

Bases: object

HelperPool provides utility functions to assist with pool-related calculations.

calculate_borrowing_interest(pool: IAPHPool, borrow_amount: int, collateral_amount: int, collateral_token: IERC20Metadata, day_second: int = 86400) → BorrowingInterest[source]

Calculates the borrowing interest for a given loan amount and collateral in a pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • borrow_amount – The borrow amount

  • collateral_amount – The collateral amount

  • collateral_token – The collateral token metadata

  • day_second – The time period in seconds for which the interest is calculated (default is one day)

Returns:

A BorrowingInterest object containing the LTV and interest

claimble_interest(pool: IAPHPool, nft_id: int) → ClaimableInterest[source]

Retrieves the claimable interest for a given NFT ID in a pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • nft_id – The NFT ID to query for claimable interest

Returns:

A ClaimableInterest object containing the token and forward interest amounts

claimble_interest_membership(pool: IAPHPool, nft_id: int) → ClaimableInterest[source]

Retrieves the claimable interest for a given NFT ID in a pool, accounting for membership.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • nft_id – The NFT ID to query for claimable interest with membership considered

Returns:

A ClaimableInterest object containing the token and forward interest amounts

get_deposit_amount_by_interest_amount(pool: IAPHPool, interest_amount: int, day_second: int = 86400) → int[source]

Calculates the deposit amount required to achieve a target interest amount for a given time period in a pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • interest_amount – The target interest amount

  • day_second – The time period in seconds for which the deposit is calculated (default is one day)

Returns:

The deposit amount required for the target interest

get_interest_amount_by_deposit_amount(pool: IAPHPool, deposit_amount: int, day_second: int = 86400) → int[source]

Calculates the interest amount based on a deposit amount for a given time period in a pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • deposit_amount – The deposit amount

  • day_second – The time period in seconds for which the interest is calculated (default is one day)

Returns:

The interest amount for the deposit

get_lending_info(pool: IAPHPool, nft_id: int) → LendingInfo[source]

Retrieves lending information for a given NFT ID in a pool, including balance, interest gained, and rank.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • nft_id – The NFT ID to query for lending information

Returns:

A LendingInfo object containing detailed information about the lending stake

get_next_lending_forw_interest(pool: IAPHPool, new_deposit_amount: int, forw_price_rate: int) → int[source]

Calculates the next lending forward interest for a new deposit in a pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • new_deposit_amount – The new deposit amount

  • forw_price_rate – The price rate of the forward token

Returns:

The next lending forward interest amount

get_next_lending_interest(pool: IAPHPool, new_deposit_amount: int) → int[source]

Calculates the next lending interest for a new deposit in a pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • new_deposit_amount – The new deposit amount

Returns:

The next lending interest amount

get_pool_info(pool: IAPHPool, forw_price_rate: int) → PoolInfo[source]

Retrieves information about a pool, including interest rates, utilization rate, and supply details.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • forw_price_rate – The price rate of the forward token

Returns:

A PoolInfo object containing detailed information about the pool

class defi_sdk_py.helper_pool.LendingInfo(lending_balance: int, interest_token_gained: int, interest_forw_gained: int, rank: int, rank_info: RankInfo)[source]

Bases: object

Represents the lending information for a stake in a pool.

Parameters:

  • lending_balance – The lending balance

  • interest_token_gained – The interest gained in tokens

  • interest_forw_gained – The interest gained in forwards

  • rank – The rank of the lender

  • rank_info – The rank information

class defi_sdk_py.helper_pool.PoolInfo(borrowing_interest: int, lending_token_interest: int, lending_forw_interest: int, utilization_rate: int, p_token_total_supply: int, current_supply: int)[source]

Bases: object

Represents the information about a pool.

Parameters:

  • borrowing_interest – The interest rate for borrowing

  • lending_token_interest – The interest rate for token lending

  • lending_forw_interest – The interest rate for forward lending

  • utilization_rate – The utilization rate of the pool

  • p_token_total_supply – The total supply of the pool’s P tokens

  • current_supply – The current supply of the pool
